snippet: AT&T T.N is close to announcing that it will buy the No. 1 U.S. satellite TV operator DirecTV DTV.O, according to people familiar with the matter, in the second potentially transformative deal to jolt the U.S. television industry this year....

headline.print_headline: AT&T Nears DirecTV Purchase in New Jolt to TV Landscape
headline.main: AT&T Nears DirecTV Purchase in New Jolt to TV Landscape

lead_paragraph: AT&T T.N is close to announcing that it will buy the No. 1 U.S. satellite TV operator DirecTV DTV.O, according to people familiar with the matter, in the second potentially transformative deal to jolt the U.S. television industry this year.
